## EntitlementInfos.all property

Map of all [EntitlementInfo](./purchases-js.entitlementinfo.md) objects (active and inactive) keyed by entitlement identifier.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly all: {
        [entitlementId: string]: EntitlementInfo;
    };
```
